data.name: NoConnectionMessage

data.value: I acknowledge that I have read and understood the Terms and Conditions.

data.value: The location service is not enabled.

data.name: AccountDisabled
data.value: Your account has been disabled, please contact {0} at {1} to activate your account.

data.name: AccountNotActivated
data.value: Your account has not been activated. Another activation email was sent to you.

data.name: InvalidBookinInfoWhenDestinationIsRequired

data.value: Please enter a valid pickup address.

data.name: InvalidAddressMessage

data.name: StatusConfirmCancelRide
data.value: This action will cancel your order, do you want to continue ?

data.name: StatusConfirmCancelRideError
data.value: The order cannot be canceled, please call to cancel this order.

data.name: StatusConfirmNewBooking
data.value: Booking a new taxi will keep this order active, do you want to continue ?

data.name: ResetPasswordSubtitleText
data.value: Enter your email and we'll send you a new one.

data.name: LoginForgotPasswordDetail
data.value: Enter your email and we'll send you a new one.

data.name: BookViewInvalidDate
data.value: The pickup date and pickup time are invalid.

data.name: CreateAccountInvalidPassword
data.value: The password is invalid. The password and confirmation must be the same. The password must also be between 6 and 10 characters.

data.name: InvalidPhoneErrorMessage
data.value: The mobile number is invalid. It must contain 10 numbers.

data.name: CreateAccountEmptyField
data.value: The data is invalid, all the fields are required.

data.name: CreateAccountErrorNotSpecified
data.value: The server didn't specify why the account could not be created, if the error persist try creating the account from the web site.

data.name: WarningEstimate
data.value: Please note that the price provided by this App is an estimate only. The fare amount as calculated by the meter, along with any applicable minimums and extras will be charged at the end of the trip.

data.name: WarningLocationService
data.value: Please turn on location services to have your location show up in the map.

data.name: ResetPasswordConfirmationMessage
data.value: A new password was send by email.

data.name: HistoryInfo
data.value: Displaying trips from the last month

data.name: NoMailClient
data.value: There are no email clients installed.

data.name: DateTimePickerPickInvalidDateMessage
data.value: The pickup date must be in the future.

data.name: StatusCannotBeDisplayed
data.value: Cannot get status. Please call provider.

data.name: UpdateBookingSettingsEmptyField
data.value: The data is invalid, all the fields are required.

data.name: AccountActivationMessage
data.value: An email has been sent. Please follow the link in the email to confirm your address.

data.name: NoFareText
data.value: Choose a destination to get a price estimate.

data.name: NoFareTextIfDestinationIsRequired
data.value: You need to specify a destination.

data.name: PickupDateDisplay
data.value: Reservation for {0:ddd, MMM d} at {0:h:mm tt}

data.name: CannotCancelOrderMessage
data.value: You can no longer cancel this order.

data.name: InvalidLocalContactMessage
data.value: The address associated to this contact cannot be validated.

data.name: LocalContactCannotBeResolverMessage
data.value: Cannot find the address associated to this contact.

data.name: NetworkErrorMessage
data.value: Cannot connect to Internet. Please check your connection settings and try again.

data.name: AppNeedUpdateMessage
data.value: A new version of the application is available, please update the app to continue.

data.name: CreateAccount_AccountAlreadyExist
data.value: The account cannot be created, this email is already in use.

data.name: HistoryViewSendReceiptError
data.value: Error sending receipt for this order

data.name: NotesToDriveLabel
data.value: Notes to driver (Name of business, specific entrance, ...)

data.name: ChangePasswordConfirmmation
data.value: You password has been updated, please sign in.

data.name: Tuto01Bottom
data.value: Start by selecting your current position.

data.name: Tuto01Top
data.value: Here's how to book a ride with just a couple of taps.

data.name: Tuto02Bottom
data.value: If it's a little off, simply reposition the map to your actual location.

data.name: Tuto02Top
data.value: We should be able to locate you using the GPS receiver in your mobile device.

data.name: Tuto03Bottom
data.value: You can search for a specific address or pick one from your favorites, contacts or a list of nearby places.

data.name: Tuto03Top
data.value: You may also select your pickup location by tapping the pickup address.

data.name: Tuto04Bottom
data.value: Doing so will provide an estimate for the cost for the trip.

data.name: Tuto04Top
data.value: If you want, you can also set your destination.

data.name: Tuto05Bottom
data.value: Or Tap the Later button to schedule your pickup for a future time or date.

data.name: Tuto05Top
data.value: Tap Book Now and a vehicle will be assigned as soon as possible.

data.name: Tuto06Bottom
data.value: Tap Confirm when you are ready to go.

data.name: Tuto06Top
data.value: The confirmation screen allows you to verify your trip details and to change any of your preferences for this specific ride.

data.name: Tuto07Bottom
data.value: Status updates are provided when the vehicles arrives at the pickup address, when you enter the vehicle, and at the end of the ride.

data.name: Tuto07Top
data.value: On the Status screen you will see a reservation number confirming your booking. Once a vehicle is assigned, you can watch as it progresses to your pickup location.

data.name: Tuto08Bottom
data.value: We hope you find this application both convenient and intuitive.

data.name: Tuto08Top
data.value: You can review your order history at any time, and even rebook a previous trip with the push of a button

data.name: AddReminderMessage
data.value: Would you like a reminder added to your calendar for this pick-up time?

data.name: CreditCardInstructions
data.value: In order to use the application, you need to add a payment method to your account.

data.name: CreditCardRemoveErrorMessage
data.value: You need to have at least one credit card in your account. If you want to remove a card, you will need to add another one before.

data.name: CreditCardName
data.value: Name as it appears on card

data.name: CreditCardInvalidCrediCardNUmber
data.value: The Credit Card Number is invalid

data.name: RemoveCreditCardMessage

data.name: NoPhoneNumberMessage

data.name: RideSummarySubTitleText

data.name: SendMessageErrorMessage

data.name: ConfirmationOfPaymentSent

data.name: VehicleNumberErrorMessage

data.name: VehicleNumberInfo
data.value: Please confirm your car number with the driver

data.name: VehicleNumberNotice
data.value: Please note that if the vehicle number presented above does not match the actual car number of your ride, we regret that payment cannot be processed through the Application. Please press the back button to return to the trip status screen, and pay the driver directly.

data.name: CmtRideLinqGenericErrorMessage
data.value: There was an error during pairing, verify your credit card information or try again later.

data.name: UnpairErrorMessage
data.value: There was an error during unpairing, please try again later.

data.name: GooglePlayServicesNotAvailableMessage
data.value: You need to update Google Play Services in order to use this application.

data.name: BookRatingErrorMessage
data.value: You need to rate your ride

data.name: CmtRideLinqConfirmPairViewConfirmPairDetailText
data.value: Confirm that you are in the vehicle number indicated below. By Tapping “Confirm”, this ride will automatically be paid by your credit card on file.

data.value: Please enter a valid account number

data.name: AccountPaymentCustomerNumberRequiredMessage
data.value: Please enter a valid rider number

data.name: Error_AccountPaymentQuestionRequiredMessage
data.value: You must answer every questions marked as required to continue.

data.name: WarningPushServiceMessage
data.value: We noticed you do not have push notifications turned on. Just to let you know if you have them enabled then you get updates about the status of your booking without having to look at the app! We promise we will not spam you with useless information!

data.name: View_AccountConfirmation_Label_Instructions
data.value: A text message with your code has been sent to your phone.

data.name: DeleteCreditCard
data.value: Delete the credit card registered to this account?

data.name: CreditCardAdded
data.value: Your account is now enabled to pay with your card on file by default. You can still choose to pay in the vehicle by selecting \"Pay in Vehicle\" on the confirmation screen

data.name: PendingOrderMessage
data.value: You cannot book this ride since an order is already pending. View the order status?

data.name: Eta
data.value: The nearest taxi is {0} and {1} {2} away

data.name: NoCardOnFileMessage
data.value: You chose to pay with a card on file, but you have no default card. Add a card to your account or change your payment method to continue.

data.name: CardExpiredMessage
data.value: Your credit card is expired. Add a new card to your account or update card informations to continue.

data.name: RateLastRideMessage
data.value: We would appreciate your feedback on your last ride, would you like to rate it?

data.name: CallDriverUsingProxyMessage
data.value: Your driver will call you back in a few minutes

data.name: TaxiHailNetworkTimeOutPopupMessage
data.value: Due to high demand, no vehicles are available right now. Do you want to book with {0} instead?

data.name: UpdateBookingSettingsInvalidAccount

data.name: UpdateBookingSettingsGenericError
data.value: An error occured when updating the booking settings

data.name: UpdateBookingSettingsInvalidCoF
data.value: You must have a card on file to use this account

data.name: MarketChangedMessage
data.value: You are leaving your local service area. Should you decide to book, your order will be dispatched using a taxi company from this area.

data.name: PromoMustUseCardOnFileMessage
data.value: In order to use a promo code, you need to pay with card on file

data.name: PromoMustUseCardOnFileWarningMessage
data.value: Please note that the discount will only be applied if the payment is made using the app

data.name: UnpairWarningMessageWithPromo

data.name: PromoBookRide
data.value: Use this promotion on next ride

data.name: ErrorCreateOrder_PendingOrder
data.value: You cannot book this ride since an order is already pending. View the order status?

data.value: Linking your PayPal account will remove your card on file and PayPal will be set as the default payment method. Proceed?

data.name: AddCoFPayPalWarning

data.value: Unable to link your PayPal account

data.name: PayPalUnlinkError
data.value: Unable to unlink your PayPal account

data.name: PayPalLinked
data.value: Your account is now enabled to pay with PayPal by default. You can still choose to pay in the vehicle by selecting \"Pay in Vehicle\" on the confirmation screen

data.name: InvalidPassengersNumber
data.value: The vehicle type that you selected does not have enough seats to accommodate your number of passengers. Please change your selection or book more than one car to accommodate your party size.

data.name: Overdue_Failed_Message
data.value: Your transaction was denied, please try again later or replace your credit card with a new one.

data.name: Overdue_Succeed_Message
data.value: Your overdue payment of {0} has been settled and your account is now enabled to pay with your card on file by default.

data.name: Overdue_Instructions
data.value: Your credit card failed to pay the previous ride, you need to either retry to pay again or update your credit card information.

data.name: Overdue_OutstandingPaymentExists
data.value: Your credit card failed to pay the previous ride. You will need to pay this outstanding amount for your card be reactivated.
